133  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& v1, SeqViewDouble& v2) {
134 
135  Dmatrix *arg1 = v1.GetData();
136  Dmatrix *arg2 = v2.GetData();
137 
138  if (v1.GetSize() != mWindow.size()) {
139  Resize(v1.GetSize());
140  LogWarning("Cs2HannWindow: Resizing window");
141  }
142 
143  if ((arg1->size1() != arg2->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg2->size2())) {
144  arg2->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
145  LogWarning("Cs2HannWindow: Resizing output");
146  }
147 
148  execute(*arg1, *arg2);
149 
150  v2.SetScale(v1.GetScale());
151  v2.SetStart(v1.GetStart());
152  v2.SetSampling(v1.GetSampling());
153 
154  };

199  void FillWindow() {
200  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mWindow.size(); i++) {
201 
202  mWindow(i) = 0.5 - 0.5 * cos(2.0 * M_PI * i / (mWindow.size() - 1.0));
203 
204  }
205  Normalize();
206  };
